MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G32 postcode area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:11am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:03 PM on Monday, 21 December 2020.
